ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 842
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the ... told ... he ... I ve been loading this song for kicks when doing Ogre bouncers recently. Once an hour, I get to feel like low level nuker :).  I ve
ygData.messageBody:
> As an example to the (unusually) low taunt of Dirge: we decided to blitz
the
> Sol B king room with full spawn, since we had an enchanter with us. I
told
> them I'd lead with Dirge as we ran in, which I did. You'd expect that at
> least one mob would have rushed me, but all 3 latched onto our warrior as
he
> ran in (ie, he hadn't even taunted or hit anything yet.)

I've been loading this song for kicks when doing Ogre bouncers recently.
Once an hour, I get to feel like low level nuker :). I've used this song
maybe 20 times? Not once has a bouncer agro'ed on me.

The other night we had a bad pull of 4 ogres and no enchanter. We had a
strong party so there was no question of zoning. I took the opporunity to
see if I could use the song to attract some attention to me to keep the
Ogres off the cleric. It was the first song I fired up in combat, hit all 4
for the full damage and not one of them agroed on me... All 4 kept beating
on our tanks. Heck, the procs on my Kisch or my Ykesha have a ton more
taunt value then the dirge!

Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 45th (almost 46th) song
Prexus
